title: Mykhailo Fedorov
content: Mykhailo Albertovych Fedorov[a] (Ukrainian: Михайло Альбертович Федоров, IPA: [meˈxaj.lɔ ɐlʲˈbɛrt.ɔ.ʋet͡ʃ ˈfɛ.dɔ.rɔu̯]; born 21 January 1991[2]) is a Ukrainian politician, and businessman. He served as a Deputy Prime Minister and Minister Digital Transformation from 2019 to March 2023.[3][4][5][6] On 21 March 2023 his duties and title was expanded to Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Education, Science and Technology – Minister for Digital Transformation.[7]
